name: Forest Avengers (usov)
description:
Dare to save the forest, be Forest Avenger but try not to destroy your keyboard or phone: jump, run, avoid bombs and find secrets. And remember – time is limited and traps can be ANYWHERE!

Mr. Blueberry came back from vacation and noticed that his home looks different.  Instead of peaceful nature, he meets dry lakes and pits with toxic substances. Help Mr. Blueberry get through the woods full of deadly danger. Find out what happened in the forest and try to save it, but be careful: time is ticking and bombs are exploding!

Are you strong enough to overcome all obstacles in your path or you can’t even pass the first level? Challenge yourself!

Forest Avengers is a hardcore retro platformer for everyone who want to win no matter what!

Features:

- 3 unique character skins

- Beautiful world in a style of old pixel games

- 3 hardcore levels with different forest locations

Play now and join Forest Avengers!

Download FREE beta down below!!!
